lead_paragraph: Leroy Bracey’s eyesight has slowly deteriorated over the years, but the 49-year-old, who is now homeless, continues to seek employment and daily spiritual encouragement.

headline.print_headline: A Blind Man Leans on His Faith as a Source of Encouragement
headline.main: Stepping Out on Faith, a Blind Man Counts His Blessings

snippet: Leroy Bracey’s eyesight has slowly deteriorated over the years, but the 49-year-old, who is now homeless, continues to seek employment and daily spiritual encouragement....
abstract: Catholic Charities Archdiocese of New York, one of eight agencies supported by New York Times’s Neediest Cases Fund, helps Leroy Bracey pay for MetroCard, as well as three months of laundry and phone bills.

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: New York Times Neediest Cases Fund

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Catholic Charities Archdiocese of New York
